name: 神舞幻想 Faith of Danschant
developer: 北京九鳳信息科技有限公司
publisher: 北京网元圣唐娱乐科技有限公司
description: A 3D ancient and fantasy RPG console game is created by Beijing Joyfun. Users will have a fabulous adventure and start their own legend in a fictional world based China’s traditional mythology.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 @ 3.30GHz (4 Cores) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti DirectX: Version 10 Additional Notes: 64-bit Only
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 @ 3.40GHz (4 Cores) Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Additional Notes: 64-bit Only
